title: Had a sweet time!
content: It was much better than I expected. I was happy to see how clean everything was. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. 8 stars of quality!

title: Great local restaurantðŸ¥°
content: I've got a fetish for good food and this place gets me hot! The experience was heavenly as I was served a meal fit for God himself. Everything was just so yummy. I found the ambiance to be very charming. I'm definitely coming back for more!

title: Worth your while
content: I have been here several times before. I found the ambiance to be very charming. The waitress did an excellent job. I had to take one star away because the floors were a little sticky.

title: Not that great
content: Meh. I felt like this place wasn't trying hard enough. The nsala soup & pounded yam I had was sublime. The ambiance gives off an earthy feel-good vibe. Some of my favorite dishes are no longer available :(

title: Great overall experience
content: It was much better than I expected. The food was savory and succulentðŸ˜‹. I was happy to see how clean everything was.

title: Not worth the money
content: When I walked in, I really wasn't expecting much. The akpu was dry. The waiter was mediocre at best. There were a lot of interesting decorations on the walls. Might be back. Don't count on it

title: Star-struckðŸ¤©
content: I stumbled on this undiscovered gem right in our neighboorhood. The waiter was prompt and polite. Their meals were true delicacies. I would eat here every day if I could afford it!

title: Was worth the time
content: Decent place. Try out the huge selection of incredible appetizers. Everything was mostly decadent. I was happy to see how clean everything was.

title: Superbe dÃ©licatesse
content: The food was cooked to perfection. After my meal, I was knocked into a food coma. The decor was unique and incredible. Everything was just so yummy. This is definitely a spot I'll be frequenting.
